body_html: I've been able to replicate this behavior by constructing n+1 padded queues and using tf.case (default a noop). n queues, one for each bucket, deququeing batch_size elements and enqueueing the result in a single enqueue to the final queue you will read from.

body: I've been able to replicate this behavior by constructing n+1 padded queues and using tf.case (default a noop).  n queues, one for each bucket, deququeing batch_size elements and enqueueing the result in a single enqueue to the final queue you will read from.
